NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CASSAVA: The construction of the <color=orange>Inspired</color> is complete, and I believe I have calculated the source of the comet by carefully retracing the trajectory of its orbit. But..
2
1
CASSAVA: According to my calculations, the comet came from a barren asteroid belt, far outside any neighboring star system.
3
2
CASSAVA: But it can't be.. Was my clan annihilated, not by any malicious entities.. but by sheer misfortune?
4
2
CASSAVA: ..It matters not.
5
4
CASSAVA: I should launch the Inspired regardless to destroy any siblings of this comet - before any more drift towards, or are already on a journey towards this star system...
6
5
CASSAVA: No matter what it takes, I must protect the surviving species of this star system.
Deep Storm Station ENTERED 1
INSP EX5 3
